title: Exploring Rust Closures and Capturing Behavior
description: In this lab, we explore closures in Rust and their capturing behavior, which allows them to capture variables by reference, mutable reference, or value, depending on the requirements of the closure.

meta.title: Exploring Rust Closures and Capturing Behavior
meta.description: Discover the power of Rust closures and their capturing behavior, including capturing by reference, mutable reference, or value.
meta.keywords: rust, rust playground, closures, reference, rust tutor, rust online compiler, rust online, rust commands, rust practice, capturing
